Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4743 affecting package SDL2 for versions less than 2.30.9-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-4743 affecting package SDL2 for versions less than 2.30.9-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package SDL2 is earlier than 2.30.9-1, affected by CVE-2022-4743
